history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB01419
FULL TITLE : AN ACT CREATING THE MANILA BAY DEVELOPMENT AUTHORITY, PRESCRIBING ITS POWERS, FUNCTIONS AND DUTIES, PROVIDING FUNDS THEREFOR, AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES

NATURE : Reform

ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE
COMMITEE HEARINGS/ACTIONS:
      1. Deliberated upon by the Mother Committee on 2017-02-21
          -Bill approved by the Committee
      2. Transmitted to the Committee on Appropriations on 2017-05-16
          -Substitute bill transmitted, for comments on budgetary provisions
      3. Transmmitted to the Committee on Ways and Means on 2017-05-16
          -Substitute bill transmitted, for comments on tax provisions
